headline: Is Dow A Bargain Or A Trap After Its 42% Slide In 2025?
summary: Wondering if Dow is a deep value opportunity or a value trap at today’s price? Let us unpack what the market is really paying for and whether that lines up with the company’s fundamentals. Over the last week the stock has slipped about 4.3%, but over the past month it is still up around 1.2%, after a tough year where shares are down roughly 42.2% year to date and 41.7% over the last 12 months. Those moves come against a backdrop of ongoing macro uncertainty hitting cyclical, materials...
